mapper.insert: INSERT INTO checklist_items (checklist_id, content, category, is_checked, created_at) VALUES (#{checklistId}, #{content}, #{category}, #{isChecked}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, checklist_id, content, category, is_checked, created_at FROM checklist_items ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE checklist_items SET checklist_id = #{checklistId}, content = #{content}, category = #{category}, is_checked = #{isChecked}, created_at = #{createdAt} WHERE id = #{id}
